text: James Simpson (born 2 April 1873) was a Scottish footballer who played as a right half. ==Career== Born in Ardrossan, Simpson played club football for Saltcoats Victoria and Third Lanark,[A Record of pre-war Scottish League Players], John Litster / Scottish Football Historian magazine, October 2012 and made three appearances for Scotland in 1895. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Saltcoats Victoria F.C. players Category:Third Lanark A.C. players Category:Association football wing halves Category:Place of death missing Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:People from Ardrossan Category:Sportspeople from North Ayrshire
title: Jimmy Simpson (footballer, born 1873)
